metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44617 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in libXpm. When processing a file with width of 0 and avery large height, some parser functions will be called repeatedly and canlead to an infinite loop, resulting in a Denial of Service in theapplication linked to the library.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-44617` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxpm4 - 1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1
xpmutils - 1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxpm package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.5.12-1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
motif package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
